name: Dora the Explorer: Dora's Cooking Club
name_original: Dora the Explorer: Dora's Cooking Club
description: Help Dora prepare delicious dishes for the Favorite Foods Festival! Create tasty treats like enchiladas, pizza and yogurt Fruit Fiestas. You’ll practice math skills as you chop, measure, stir and sprinkle in over 30 cooking games! Demonstrates number identification, counting, shape recognition, pattern completion and measurement to future chefs everywhere! ¡Vamos a cocinar! Let's Cook!
